attributes.action: Time to Quit the European Union
attributes.additional_details:
As we do not have a guaranteed referendum on membership of the European Union. This e-petition has been set for members of the public to express their right to demand that the United Kingdom should be coming out of the EU.

1. We pay £50,000,000+ to the EU everyday.
2. The majority of our politically correct laws come from the EU
3. We want to decide OUR future for OUR country.

We call on the government to quit the European Union and let the people of this country take back control of our future.
